portfolio.name: Widewail

topGaps.issue: No visible pricing page - 'Get custom pricing' creates friction despite strong value metrics

portfolio.observation: Excellent proof points (633% review volume growth, 6 of top 25 dealer groups). Strong automotive vertical focus. Hidden pricing limits self-service conversion.

portfolio.name: HiBid

topGaps.issue: Marketplace positioning solid but competitive moat vs. LiveAuctioneers not clearly articulated

portfolio.observation: Transparent pricing model (rare in industry). Clear value prop for auctioneers. $95/mo entry point visible. Strong two-sided marketplace dynamics.

portfolio.name: Perceptyx

topGaps.issue: Custom pricing only - enterprise buyers have no anchor for budget discussions
No ROI calculator or self-service demo despite strong quantified outcomes

portfolio.observation: Strong analyst recognition (Forrester Wave Leader). Good proof (40% reduction in turnover). Enterprise-only positioning limits mid-market expansion.

portfolio.name: ePlanSoft

topGaps.issue: Comparative guide vs. Bluebeam/Avolve exists but not prominently featured
No pricing visibility - government procurement needs clear budget positioning

portfolio.observation: Solid product messaging. Good case studies (Syracuse, Montgomery County). Market position vs. Bluebeam/Adobe could be sharper.

portfolio.name: DealerBuilt

topGaps.issue: Complex multi-product suite (Lightyear, Oplogic, Vistadash) creates buyer confusion
Limited visible case studies despite strong client base claims

portfolio.observation: Strong differentiation on data ownership and named-user pricing. Anti-CDK/Reynolds positioning resonates. Suite complexity may slow sales cycles.

portfolio.name: OpenBrand

topGaps.issue: Subscription pricing not published despite freemium signal (MarketSignal)

portfolio.observation: Strong market position via NIQ partnership. 20-year data history is real moat. Free MarketSignal dashboard smart PLG move. Complex acquisition history (TraQline, Gap Intelligence) not fully integrated in messaging.

portfolio.name: Source Intelligence

topGaps.issue: Regulatory compliance positioning but competitive landscape vs. Assent not addressed
No pricing transparency for a compliance product where budgeting is critical

portfolio.observation: Addresses real pain (conflict minerals, CMRT). Market tailwinds from ESG/supply chain transparency. Value quantification could be stronger.

portfolio.name: EditShare

topGaps.issue: Technical storage/workflow messaging - missing customer ROI quantification
Complex product suite without clear buyer journey guidance

portfolio.observation: Niche media production vertical. Cloud + on-prem hybrid positioning. Technical messaging may miss decision-maker value narrative.
